players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."

Diana: "I agree with Bob that we should all keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our team and eliminate any potential threats."
Charlie: "I'm glad we're all on the same page about keeping a close eye on each other. Let's try to gather as much information as possible during this game to help us make informed decisions."

You: "I think it's important that we continue to communicate openly with each other and share any information we may have. Let's try to build trust within our team and work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
